dateContent.title: Building my design portfolio
dateContent.text: Working on my design portfolio. And plan to earning from it by next month. I plan to become a graphic designer is because I'm looking ways to earn extra money and since I have some design experience, so I want to turn these skills into real income.

dateContent.title: My Design Portfolio
dateContent.text: Finished working on my design portfolio. I'll start posting my projects and promoting myself on xiaohongshu.

dateContent.title: From Portfolio to Paycheck
dateContent.text: After one month, I successfully closed several deals. For the first time, actually second time I turned my own skills into a real income. But I've realise this path will not be the right fit for me. Anyways, I learned alot, gaining new skills, knowledge and also the negotiation skills with clients.

dateContent.title: Bought my first guitar ðŸŽ¸
dateContent.text: My first guitar bought by my own. Not expensive but finally fullfilled a long time wish.

dateContent.title: First Year of Degree Sem 1
dateContent.text: Bachelor of Engineering (Hons.) (Electronics majoring in Computer)

dateContent.title: U Do
dateContent.text: This is the first application made by me. A macOS Application that allows you to show your TODO lists directly on menubar and cycles through each task at a set interval.

dateContent.title: Start to learn HTML/CSS/JS
dateContent.text: Starting to learn the basic HTML/CSS/JS myself. Planning to make my own portfolio website.

dateContent.title: Aiming to buy a 3D printer
dateContent.text: Hoping to get my own 3D printer by this year, aiming for November.

dateContent.title: My Portfolio Website
dateContent.text: My first website. A personal website I built to showcase my portfolio, skills, and background. Everything you see here was designed and developed by me.

dateContent.title: Try to learn more on backend
dateContent.text: Starting to learn more on backend development like AJAX, NodeJS, SQL. Hoping to wrap it all up by the end of the year!
